title: Can't login client stuck on authenticating
body: I was on a champion select when suddendly my league said i lost connection so i closed it and tried to login againg but i couldn't because it doesn't get past Authenticating. I was with a friend he says that even tho i wasnt online i was still on a party with him (he then left the party so i dont know if im still there). I already full repaired the client but still wasnt able to log in. I doubt its a server problem cause my friend already login 2 times

replies.body: Thanks for the report on this!  I wasn't able to see any authentication server issues, but you're not the first to report this error happening.  Is everything okay now?
I have been stuck on the same authentication problem for about 12 hours now
Yes i had to re download league 2 times but now its working
It's not working for me. Same thing happened.  I got kicked from champion select screen and I had to restart client. After restarting client I could not log back in due to authenticating.

Same here.. Already did a full repair and run Hextech Repair Tool but it still doesn't work.
